columns.name: recovery_instance_id
columns.description: The id of the recovery instance.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the recovery instance

columns.name: source_server_id
columns.description: The source server ID that this recovery instance is associated with.

columns.name: ec2_instance_id
columns.description: The EC2 instance ID of the recovery instance.

columns.name: ec2_instance_state
columns.description: The state of the EC2 instance for this recovery instance.

columns.name: is_drill
columns.description: Whether this recovery instance was created for a drill or for an actual recovery event.

columns.name: job_id
columns.description: The ID of the Job that created the recovery instance.

columns.name: origin_environment
columns.description: Environment (On Premises/AWS) of the instance that the recovery instance originated from.

columns.name: point_in_time_snapshot_date_time
columns.description: The date and time of the Point in Time (PIT) snapshot that this recovery instance was launched from.

columns.name: data_replication_info
columns.description: The Data Replication Info of the recovery instance.

columns.name: failback
columns.description: An object representing failback related information of the recovery instance.

columns.name: recovery_instance_properties
columns.description: Properties of the recovery instance machine.
